summary: A group of cryptographers have analyzed the eiDAS 2. 0 regulation (electronic identification and trust services) that defines the new EU Digital Identity Wallet.
title: Security Analysis of the EU’s Digital Wallet

summary: I've never really thought about it before this morning, thinking I never really had a "brand" per se, but the truth is, when I looked closer, yes, I do.  And it's quite distinctive to me.  From the choice of fonts I like to use because of the way they look, to the colours I choose for links and the fact I like clean, crisp, uncluttered white space...
title: Branding

summary:
What do you think about music.  I'm not sure I understand the subtle,
almost pathological appeal music has in practically every society in the
world.  Children love to sing and are often prodded into reluctant
performances by their elders...
